title: Will an ‘energy island’ bring Denmark and Belgium closer?
lead: An electricity interconnector will pass through the artificial island and connect the two countries

title: Matrix-style tech turns you into a battery!
lead: The wearable device converts the body’s temperature into electricity

title: Biden injects $100m into green energy tech research
lead: Energy technologies designed to address climate challenges will benefit

title: Seven areas to be classified as water stressed
lead: The Environment Agency has launched a consultation to safeguard water supplies

title: France’s Valeo lent €600m for research into reducing vehicle emissions
lead: The funds will be allocated to the company’s Europe-based research projects, primarily in France but also in Germany, the Czech Republic and Ireland

title: MEPs call for suspension of commercial launch of nuclear plant in Belarus
lead: They have voiced ‘serious concerns’ over the safety of the Ostrovets nuclear plant, with Parliament criticising the ‘hasty commissioning’ of the facility

title: Crown Estate Scotland delays offshore wind farms auction
lead: It says the review will help ensure the offshore wind leasing process attracts major green investment to Scotland by delivering long term economic and net zero benefits

title: What is Utility Bill Management?
lead: Utility bill management (UBM) sometimes referred to as utility expense management (UEM), simply put, is the process of streamlining utility bill collection, validation, and payment.

title: Is this the green future of home heating?
lead: Wales and West Utilities and UK Power Networks trial a new hybrid heating system

title: EV rapid charge-points increase by 37% in 2020
lead: Official figures show nearly 1,288 more EV charging devices were available in the fourth quarter of 2020
